meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cheap or gaudy in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The tawdrinesses of the costume made it look like a child's play outfit.
meanings.sent2: Her room was filled with tawdrinesses, from the glittery curtains to the plastic flowers.
meanings.sent3: The tawdrinesses of the party decorations were so over the top that they made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The tawdrinesses of the jewelry she wore reflected her lack of sophistication.
meanings.sent5: The tawdrinesses of the painting were so glaring that it hurt the eyes to look at it.

meanings.definition: The act of being showy or flashy in a tasteless way.
meanings.sent1: His tawdrinesses in dressing loudly made him stand out in a negative way.
meanings.sent2: The tawdrinesses of her behavior at the party drew unwanted attention.
meanings.sent3: The tawdrinesses of his dance moves were so exaggerated that they became comical.
meanings.sent4: Her tawdrinesses in speech were like a bright neon sign, impossible to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The tawdrinesses of his car modifications screamed for attention wherever he went.
